name: White Nothing
description: White Nothing is a brutal and bloody story about the life of a German soldier during Second World War in the rear of the Red Army. It's a harsh Russian winter, both armies are on the verge of survival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
